name: Super Green Pesto
description: You’re the boss here: pick your greens, and nuts or seeds, to make this pesto your own. Any way you choose, it’s gonna be, well, super. Think beyond pasta sauce—pesto’s amazing as a spread on sandwiches and pizza, and as a sauce for chicken and fish. Plus, it’s freezer-friendly! Use half now and freeze the rest for later (who doesn’t love easy, future dinners?).

ingredients.name: unsalted nuts or seeds of your choice

preparation: In a food processor, combine seasoning, spinach, oil, and nuts. Blend until smooth.
Store in an airtight container in the fridge for up to 5 days.
tips: Try cashews, walnuts, almonds, or pine nuts. For a nut-free pesto, use pumpkin or sunflower seeds.
If you are following the Epic Life plan, enjoy 2 tbsp of pesto as a healthy fat choice.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve 2 tbsp prepared pesto with 1 cup cooked pasta, 4 oz (113 g) lean protein and 1 cup sliced veggies.
